title: Iodex 28G Oint
details:
Iodex is a generic medication manufactured by apollo pharmacy. It belongs to the drug class known as antiseptic and germicides. It also belongs to the medicine category of vaginal anti-infectives. Iodex ointment contains natural ingredients such

precautions: Some of the iodex precautions are listed below that should be followed while using it.Before using the iodex, inform your doctorAbout the patient medical history.If you are allergic to any of the ingredients present in this medication.If you have any hypersensitivity problems.If you are taking any supplement or any other prescription at the same time.Avoid using the iodex on children without consulting your doctor.Consult your doctor before using iodex in pregnancy. Also, nursing mothers should consult the doctor before using it.Store it at room temperature.If the iodex leaflet contains the content "only for external use," then do not take it by mouth to treat the mouth infections.Avoid touching the iodex with your eyes. If get touched with your eyes, then immediately wash your eyes with water and consult your doctor for medical advice.Avoid applying the iodex on deep wounds or puncture wounds.Avoid applying it to large areas. Always follow the direction suggested by the doctor or available in the leaflet.Consult a doctor, if you're hypersensitive to any of its ingredients. Keep out of the reach of children. Protect from direct exposure to sunlight, and heat. Store below the room temperature.
effects: Every patient using the iodex may not experience its side effects. However, some of the iodex formula side effects are listed below. If any of the side effects persist or get worsen, then immediately seek medical help.It can cause swelling, warmth, redness, and blistering of the skin.It can also cause crusting of the skin.You may experience severe skin irritation, itching, and burning of the skin.In some patient's severe allergic reactions are also reported, such as skin rashes, itching, allergy, swelling, and redness of the skin.The above list may not contain all the possible side effects of iodex. Thus, for your satisfaction, you can consult your doctor. Allergic contact Dermatitis may occur.

title: Dicloran 20G Gel
details:
Dicloran gel is a prescribed medicine that is manufactured by a unique Pharma lab, and its distributor is named Unimed. Dicloran gel composition consists of diclofenac sodium that is an active ingredient in this medicine. It is available in vario

READ MORE
precautions: Following dicloran gel precautions should be followed while using it to get effective results.Inform the doctor when you get prescribed this medicineAbout your medical history, specifically, if you have asthma or urticaria disease.If you have any allergic problems from the ingredient used in this medicine.About the prescription that you are already following. While taking dicloran gel, do not drive. Also, avoid the use of heavy machinery that needs mental alertness. Do not use it if you are pregnant. Avoid taking it by mouth. Also, avoid touching it with eyes, nose, and lips.Consult your doctor before applying it on the sun-burned skin, irritated skin, and open wounds.Wash your hands before and after applying for this medicine. Also, wash the affected area before applying it that is being treated.Use the exact amount as suggested by the doctor. Excessive use of this gel may result in pilling. And less amount may not be effective to get well soon.Check the expiry date before applying it. Store it at room temperature.ContraindicationsDicloran gel contraindications are listed below. Thus, avoid using dicloran in those medical conditions.Children under having age of fourteen years do not use this medicine.Do not use dicloran gel if you notice the symptoms of asthma. Or patients suffering from already asthma disease do not use this gel.Dicloran gel is contraindicated to the patients having hypersensitivity problems from the ingredient used in the formulation of dicloran gel.The use of Dicloran gel in pregnancy is contraindicated.It is also contraindicated to use in the urticaria medical condition.Patient should not wash the treated area for at least 1 hour after the application. It should not be applied to open wounds.
effects: Dicloran can result from some side effects, but not every patient using dicloran gel needs to experience them. Some of the dicloran gel side effects are listed below.It can cause some common side effects such as nausea, indigestion, diarrhea, constipation, headache, dizziness, drowsiness, and tiredness. It can also cause difficulty in breathing. Dicloran gel contains some active ingredients that can result in allergic reactions such as itching.It can cause stuffy nose and gas problems.It can result in high blood pressure problems.
